title: My Client won't start League since the new one came out.
body: Okay so i open league and click start. Then it the only thig that pops up is an error code (0xc0000005). I have reinstalled and tried to run as administrator to hopefully fix the problem but to no avail its not working. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.

Hey dude, I appreciate you helping out and getting your community set on the new client but there's some misconceptions that need to get out of the way asap.  The [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) is perfectly usable for the updated client, and also yields necessary logs in case our tech team needs to help on an individual level.  I've seen a few posts where you're calling us out, but we're not in the business of trying to ruse players, so be a pal and work with us.  <3  If you've got any questions I'll do my best to answer.  Thanks for the assist!

I hear what you're saying, and I'm feeling you.  You have every right to share your feelings and experience so far, so don't feel like you have to delete your posts.  The legacy client was extremely old, so the change wasn't just for an aesthetic purpose but to build a better framework for new features and customization.  As a result, the transition for some players have been hell but I don't want you to feel like we're just going to leave you behind.  

I can't speak for the development team or advocate on their behalf, but I'm upset because you are.  :(  Those of us here in Player Support are not PR, you're right, we just want to fix issues and take care of each other.  Please let us help you!  

The fixes that you've tried might be able to help, but they're more of a temporary workaround because the inherent issue wasn't resolved.  The blocks you're also mentioning in-game are really strange, so we want to take a look at that as well.  I know you've spent a few days on this already, but you don't have to do it alone.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work together.  Maybe even make some discoveries!  Hope to see you there!!!

Rineyy provided a step for the HRT which can help, but not until we resolve what's causing your specific error.  We've seen a few reports on this, and the cause has been a combination of security settings preventing game files from being accessed as well as old game files that are not updated properly into the updated client.  The first step I suggest is running through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that you can update without any blocks along the way.  Once completed, give the HRT a go by performing a clean reinstall.  We're here to help, so hit us up if you have any questions.
